Package ajbc.doodle.calendar.controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
ajbc.doodle.calendar.controllers.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/users") public class UserController extends Object
Responsible for API requests, regarding users.
Author:
Shelly

    • isSubscribed

      @PostMapping("/isSubscribed") public boolean isSubscribed(@RequestBody SubscriptionEndpoint subscription) throws DaoException
      This method checks if a user exist in the DB.
      Parameters:
      subscription - - contains the information of a user's connection, which is described as endpoint.
      Returns:
      true if the user exists in the DB, false if it doesn't.
